task: Bundle Size Impact Analysis - AI Models

dependencies.name: @huggingface/transformers
dependencies.notes: Whisper models (tiny ~40MB, base ~74MB, small ~244MB) - loaded on demand

dependencies.name: @imgly/background-removal
dependencies.notes: Downloads briaai/RMBG-1.4 model (~180MB) at first use

dependencies.name: onnxruntime-web
dependencies.notes: Core ONNX runtime for all AI inference in browser

dependencies.name: tesseract.js
dependencies.notes: OCR engine - downloads language data (~20MB) on first use

dependencies.name: @upscalerjs/esrgan-*
dependencies.notes: ESRGAN models for image upscaling (12MB each, 3 variants)

recommendations: Use dynamic imports for AI tools: const { pipeline } = await import('@huggingface/transformers')
Implement model selection UI to let users choose smaller models (whisper-tiny vs small)
Add progress indicators for model downloads with size estimates
Consider Service Worker caching for models to avoid re-downloads
For background removal, offer lightweight alternative using color keying for simple cases
Use WebGPU backend when available (faster, smaller than WebAssembly)
Compress ONNX models with quantization (INT8) to reduce size by ~4x
